data.title: Glenn Garland on LinkedIn: #editing #podcast #interview #avatarthewayofwater #avatar #jamescameron
data.meta_description:
Hi Friends,

The next podcast episode of Editors on Editing is now live. I had the awesome pleasure of speaking with James Cameron, Stephen E. Rivkin and John…
data.text:
The next Editors on Editing podcast featuring Maurissa Horwitz speaking about editing INSIDE OUT 2 has just dropped. Maurissa’s credits include PLAYMOBIL: THE MOVIE and OPEN SEASON: SCARED SILLY. She has also been an additional editor on NIMONA, THE BAD GUYS, TINKER BELL AND THE LEGEND OF THE NEVERBEAST, and PLANES: FIRE & RESCUE. The interview runs about 51 minutes and is featured on Art of the Frame: https://lnkd.in/gpiAZkPP And at American Cinema Editors at: https://lnkd.in/ghf_wqF6 It can be also be played on Spotify, iTunes, Apple Podcast, the ACE website - https://lnkd.in/ew8i9ek - and wherever you listen to podcasts. Enjoy and be sure to subscribe! #insideout2 #editing

Next Editors on Editing podcast is available. James Wilcox, ACE, Dana Glauberman, ACE, and Rosanne Tan, ACE talk about editing the exhilarating first season of AHSOKA. Dana, who was nominated for an EDDIE award for AHSOKA, also received EDDIE nominations for THANK YOU FOR SMOKING, JUNO, UP IN THE AIR, for which she was also nominated for both a BAFTA and CRITIC’S CHOICE AWARD, YOUNG ADULT, and THE MANDALORIAN, for which she was nominated for a Primetime Emmy. Rosanne’s credits include, HOMECOMING, for which she was nominated for an EDDIE, MR. ROBOT, for which she was nominated for two EDDIES, THE FALCON AND THE WINTER SOLDIER, and HAWKEYE. JAMES has edited GENIUS: EINSTEIN CHAPTER ONE, for which he won the EDDIE, GENIUS: PICASSO AND ARETHA, ROOTS, CSI:MIAMI, HAWAII 5-O, EVERYBODY HATES CHRIS, HILLBILLY ELEGY and THIRTEEN LIVES. The interview runs about 59 minutes and is featured on Art of the Frame: https://lnkd.in/gq3JMgsM And: https://lnkd.in/gn7gi5Q7 It can be also be played on Spotify, iTunes, Apple Podcast, the ACE website - https://lnkd.in/ew8i9ek - and wherever you listen to podcasts. This and previous interviews can be listened to at: https://lnkd.in/gB8itWvD Enjoy and be sure to subscribe! #ahsoka #editing #podcast

The next Editors on Editing podcast is now available. I had the great pleasure of speaking with Melissa Kent about editing the beautiful, inventive film, MÚSICA. Melissa has edited such excellent projects as the VIRGIN SUICIDES, CROSSROADS, THE REAGANS, for which she was nominated for the EDDIE with Michael Brown, FOUR CHRISTMASES, THE AGE OF ADALINE, THE INTRUDER, and THE DIRT. The interview runs about 49 minutes and is featured on Art of the Frame: https://lnkd.in/gGnT4Nam And American Cinema Editors at: https://lnkd.in/gWEUsbGw This and previous interviews can be listened to at: https://lnkd.in/gB8itWvD Enjoy and be sure to subscribe!

The next Editors on Editing podcast is now available. I had the great pleasure of speaking with Michael Anthony Brown, Tim Wilsbach, ACE, Matt Wafaie, and Mike Oliver about editing season 2 of the beloved doc./sports series, WELCOME TO WREXHAM. The interview runs about 45 minutes and is featured on Art of the Frame: https://lnkd.in/gJYf7WuA And at American Cinema Editors at: https://lnkd.in/gDSpRcYY It can be also be played on Spotify, iTunes, Apple Podcast, the ACE website - https://lnkd.in/ew8i9ek - and wherever you listen to podcasts. This and previous interviews can be listened to at: https://lnkd.in/gB8itWvD Enjoy and be sure to subscribe! #welcometowrexham #editing #podcast

Next Editors on Editing podcast: Yorgos Mavropsaridis talks about editing the brilliant and exhilarating film, POOR THINGS, for which he was recently nominated for an EDDIE, BAFTA, Critics Choice Award and Oscar for his excellent work. Yorgos has edited such marvelous movies as SILVAS, MOTHERLAND, DOGTOOTH, THE LOBSTER, for which he was nominated for the EDDIE, THE KILLING OF THE SACRED DEER, and THE FAVOURITE, for which he was nominated for the BAFTA and Oscar and won the EDDIE. The interview runs about 43 minutes and is featured on Art of the Frame: https://lnkd.in/gVA6dect And at American Cinema Editors: https://lnkd.in/gSbXAi6W It can be also be played on Spotify, iTunes, Apple Podcast, the ACE website - https://lnkd.in/ew8i9ek - and wherever you listen to podcasts. This and previous at: https://lnkd.in/gB8itWvD Enjoy and be sure to subscribe! #poorthings #podcast #editing

The next Editors on Editing podcast is available. I had the pleasure of speaking with Hilda Rasula about editing the brilliant, satirical comedy, AMERICAN FICTION. Hilda has edited such excellent projects as TRANSPARENT, SORRY FOR YOUR LOSS, LITTLE AMERICA, FRENCH EXIT, and VENGEANCE. The interview runs about 45 minutes and is featured on Art of the Frame: https://lnkd.in/eXUsX79t And at American Cinema Editors at: https://lnkd.in/e9azMXAF It can be also be played on Spotify, iTunes, Apple Podcast, the ACE website - https://lnkd.in/ew8i9ek - and wherever you listen to podcasts. This and previous interviews can be listened to at: https://lnkd.in/gB8itWvD Enjoy and be sure to subscribe! #americanfiction #podcast #editing

The next Editors on Editing podcast is now available. I had the pleasure of speaking with Jon Poll about editing the new musical version of THE COLOR PURPLE. Jon has edited such excellent projects as AUSTIN POWERS: THE SPY WHO SHAGGED ME, MEET THE FOCKERS, THE GREATEST SHOWMAN, BOMBSHELL, and FATHER OF THE BRIDE. The interview runs about 44 minutes and is featured on Art of the Frame: https://lnkd.in/gD6tkn5f And at American Cinema Editors at: https://lnkd.in/gYR2bHJ5 It can be also be played on Spotify, iTunes, Apple Podcast, the ACE website - https://lnkd.in/ew8i9ek - and wherever you listen to podcasts. This and previous interviews can be listened to at: https://lnkd.in/gB8itWvD Enjoy and be sure to subscribe! #thecolorpurple #editing #podcast

The next Editors on Editing podcast and video interview is now available. I had the great pleasure of speaking with my friend, Kevin Tent, about editing Alexander Payne's fantastic motion picture, THE HOLDOVERS. Kevin has edited all of Payne’s films including ELECTION, ABOUT SCHMIDT, SIDEWAYS and NEBRASKA, all for which he was nominated for the EDDIE, and THE DESCENDANTS for which he won the EDDIE and was nominated for the Oscar. He has also crafted such terrific movies as BLOW, GIRL INTERRUPTED, and THE PEANUT BUTTER FALCON. The video interview and podcast run about 44 minutes. Both are featured on the ACE website at: https://lnkd.in/gQXQacmG The podcast itself can be listened to at: https://lnkd.in/gZXEyMNg As well as on Spotify, iTunes, Apple Podcast, the ACE website - https://lnkd.in/ew8i9ek - and wherever you listen to podcasts. This and previous interviews can be listened to at: https://lnkd.in/gB8itWvD Enjoy and be sure to subscribe! #theholdovers #alexanderpayne #editing #podcast

The next Editors on Editing podcast is now available. I had the pleasure of speaking with Claire Simpson and Sam Restivo about editing Ridley Scott's epic, NAPOLEON. Claire has edited such incredible films as SALVADOR, WALL STREET, PLATOON, for which she won the BAFTA, EDDIE, and Oscar, THE CONSTANT GARDENER, for which she was nominated for the EDDIE and Oscar while winning the BAFTA, THE READER, NINE, for which she was nominated for the BAFTA, and THE LAST DUEL while Sam has been an additional editor on THE GREATEST SHOWMAN, RAISED BY WOLVES, and THE HOUSE OF GUCCI. The interview runs about 45 minutes and is featured on Art of the Frame: https://lnkd.in/gYUFDX9X And at American Cinema Editors at: https://lnkd.in/gAfR9QZZ It can be also be played on Spotify, iTunes, Apple Podcast, the ACE website - https://lnkd.in/ew8i9ek - and wherever you listen to podcasts. This and previous interviews can be listened to at: https://lnkd.in/gB8itWvD Enjoy and be sure to subscribe! #napoleon #ridleyscott #editing #podcast
